column12: notes
According to the source, Chris Smith came out publicly as gay at a rally in 1984. His full term of office is listed in this dataset.
John Cope is the Chairman of the LGBT+ Conservative (as at the time of tweeting)
Justine Greening had the Conservative party whip removed from her in September 2019, and now sits as an independent MP
Justine Greening had the Conservative party whip removed from her in September 2019, and now sits as an independent MP
Pamela Brooks is Kate Osborne's wife and has tweeted about this on multiple occassions. This information is corroborated by also the MP's Wikipedia page.
Multiple additional newspaper sources refer to to Kim’s ‘partner’ or ‘wife’.
Layla Moran came out at pansexual in an interview with PinkNews on 2 January 2020. Her full term of office as an MP is listed in this data set.
Margot James had the Conservative party whip removed from her in September 2019, and now sits as an independent MP
Margot James had the Conservative party whip restored in October 2019, and now sits as a Conservative MP
Margot James had the Conservative party whip removed from her in September 2019, and now sits as an independent MP
Michael Fabricant came out as bisexual during TV show “First Dates” in 2017. His full term of office is listed in this data set.
Neale Hanvey was suspended from the Scottish National Party during the 2019 election campaign; he had the party whip restored on 29 May 2020.
Neale Hanvey was suspended from the Scottish National Party during the 2019 election campaign; he had the party whip restored on 29 May 2020.
Neale Hanvey changed his political party on 28 March 2021 to the Alba Party.
Nick Boles resigned the Conservative party whip in April 2019 to sit as an independent MP

Olivia Blake tweeted that she identified as a “bi woman” to mark Bi Awareness Week in September 2021.
Peter refers too his partner, Gareth, in his acceptance speech (video, linked)
Rob Roberts came out on IDAHOBIT 2020.
Rob Roberts lost the Conservative Party whip on 25 May 2021
